data.message:
It's tomorrow...so uh where's the fuckin cypher. 
You say something, do It.
You have fans. Loyal fans.

replies.message: 'Tomorrow' is not over yet. Be patient 'loyal' fan...

What are you talking about buddy yeaterday is far over. That post was on the 6th, it said tomorrow the cypher comes out tomorrow was the 7th...can you guess what today's date is? Which makes it going on 2 days. Dick.
this has nothing to do with timezones its been way more than 24 hours...

Ok you sound ridiculous. Buddy Detroit is eastern time just like New York and just like Tampa Florida. So when he says a day and or a time. It means over here eastern time. Were not in fucking Africa.

You know, I didn't realize I had to be so specific for all of his little mouth critters. Next time I will be more specific. You my friend are a fucking even bigger asshole for thinking that I believe that he writes his posts. But next time I will be more specific. So jerkoffs like you don't pop up and try to get some facebook likes for picking facebook fight on a Facebook page you fucking Facebook fag.
